SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli

Class DefaultCliGraphics

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.DefaultCliGraphics
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, ModelListener
public class DefaultCliGraphics extends Object implements ModelListener
Represents the "default" CLI graphic view. The class contains both setup and update methods for the various CLI graphic elements.
